name: Attuned_Brutes_Fury_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives this power a chance to grant 5 Fury to the Brute and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Brutes and may be slotted into any Brute damage power.
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate and has a chance to grant extra Fury
